summary: Reckless desire wreaks havoc over Memorial Day weekend as a family confronts the volatile and fragile nature of love. Inspired by Anton Chekhov's "The Seagull," set in rural New England in 1984.
cast: Katie Holmes|Allison Janney|Ben Whishaw|Juliet Rylance|Jean Reno|Cherry Jones|William Hurt|Michael Nyqvist|Mark Rylance|Christian Camargo|Russell Means|Bridget McKevitt|Denise de Pass|Jane Park-Stettner
title: Days and Nights
